attributes.action: stop the sale of alcohol,and cigerettes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just ban these substances,and just allow non-alcoholic drinks to be sold in shops,and pubs. because, why advertise and show people drinking alcohol, and then ban smoking on adverts and tv programs, when booze can be just as damageing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
